item.title: Kristan add a quote by Chris Raschka
item.description: "Of all the miserable ways to spend a miserable Saturday morning in the miserable month of January, this had to be the miserablest. In fact, the most miserablest." -- Chris Raschka

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Mindy Kaling
item.description: "Writing, at its heart, is a solitary pursuit, designed to make people depressoids, drug addicts, misanthropes, and antisocial weirdos." -- Mindy Kaling

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "In any event, parents never underestimated the abilities of their own children. Quite the reverse. Sometimes it was well nigh impossible for a teacher to convince the proud father or mother that their beloved offspring was a complete nitwit." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Roald Dahl
item.description: "Matilda said, "Never do anything by halves if you want to get away with it. Be outrageous. Go the whole hog. Make sure everything you do is so completely crazy it's unbelievable..." -- Roald Dahl

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Roald Dahl
Kristan add a quote by Marvin J. Ashton
item.description: "Perhaps the greatest charity comes when we are kind to each other, when we don’t judge or categorize someone else, when we simply give each other the benefit of the doubt or remain quiet. Charity is accepting someone’s differences, weaknesses, and shortcomings; having patience with someone who has let us down; or resisting the impulse to become offended when someone doesn’t handle something the way we might have hoped. Charity is refusing to take advantage of another’s weakness and being willing to forgive someone who has hurt us. Charity is expecting the best of each other" -- Marvin J. Ashton

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Marvin J. Ashton
item.description: "Be the one who nurtures and builds. Be the one who has an understanding and a forgiving heart one who looks for the best in people. Leave people better than you found them." -- Marvin J. Ashton

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Phoebe Stone
item.description: "Actually everybody has a story, a fairy tale in their heart that they adhere to." -- Phoebe Stone

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Sally Hobart Alexander
item.description: "Like all children, you would have loved and admired her. You would have named your favorite doll after her....And then you would have poked out the doll's eyes." -- Sally Hobart Alexander

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Rebecca Makkai
item.description: "I might be the villain of this story." -- Rebecca Makkai

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Rebecca Makkai
item.description: "...all I knew were novels. It gave me pause, for a moment, that all my reference points were fiction, that all my narratives were lies." -- Rebecca Makkai

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Rebecca Makkai
item.description: "I believed that books might save him because I knew they had so far, and because I knew the people books had saved. They were college professors and actors and scientists and poets. They got to college and sat on dorm floors drinking coffee, amazed they'd finally found their soul mates. They always dressed a little out of season. Their names were enshrined on the pink cards in the pockets of all the forgotten hardbacks in every library basement in America. If the librarians were lazy enough or nostalgic enough or smart enough, those names would stay there forever." -- Rebecca Makkai

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Rebecca Makkai
item.description: "So here, patient listener: your soothing epilogue. Imagine him happy. Imagine him spinning in circles... Imagine his heaven, where he can float through characters and books at will. (Let's dream him up a king, a giant, a boy who can fly.) Imagine him already there, under his covers with the flashlight." -- Rebecca Makkai

item.title: Kristan add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "If every person in this room made it a rule that wherever you are, whenever you can, you wil try to act a little kinder than is necessary - the world really would be a better place. And if you do this, if you act just a little kinder than is necessary, someone else, somewhere, someday, may recognize in you, in every single one of you, the face of God." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Kristan add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "Kinder than is <i>necessary</i>. Because it's not enough to be kind. One should be kinder than needed." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Kristan add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "AUGUST PULLMAN'S PRECEPT Everyone deserves a standing ovation because we all overcometh the world. --Auggie" -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Kristan add a quote by R.J. Palacio
item.description: "no, no, it's not all random, if it really was all random, the universe would abandon us completely. and the universe doesn't. it takes care of its most fragile creations in ways we can't see. like with parents who adore you blindly. and a big sister who feels guilty for being human over you. and a little gravelly-voiced kid whose friends have left him over you. and even a pink-haired girl who carries your picture in her wallet. maybe it is a lottery, but the universe makes it all even out in the end. the universe takes care of all its birds." -- R.J. Palacio

item.title: Kristan add a quote by RJ Palacio
item.description: "...we should be remembered for the things we do. The things we do are the most important things of all. They are more important than what we say or what we look like. The things we do outlast our mortality. The things we do are like monuments that people build to honour heroes after they've died. They're like the pyramids that the Egyptians built to honour the Pharaohs. Only instead of being made out of stone, they're made out of the memories people have of you. That's why your deeds are like your monuments. Built with memories instead of with stone." -- RJ Palacio

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "As he read, I fell in love the way you fall asleep: slowly, and then all at once." -- John Green

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books so special and rare and yours that advertising your affection feels like a betrayal." -- John Green

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "You are so busy being YOU that you have no idea how utterly unprecedented you are." -- John Green

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description:
"Tell me my copy is missing the last twenty pages or something.
Hazel Grace, tell me I have not reached the end of this book.
OH MY GOD DO THEY GET MARRIED OR NOT OH MY GOD WHAT IS THIS?!" -- John Green

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Vaunda Micheaux Nelson
item.description: "Everybody keeps saying be satisfied with Jesus's love, and he will give us our daily bread. I keep waiting, but we never get any bread, so I have to go out and do things for myself." -- Vaunda Micheaux Nelson

item.title: Kristan add a quote by A.S. King
item.description: "The world is full of assholes. What are you doing to make sure you're not one of them?" -- A.S. King

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Why fit in when you were born to stand out?" -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Kristan add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Harry — I think I've just understood something! I've got to go to the library!” And she sprinted away, up the stairs. “<i>What</i> does she understand?” said Harry distractedly, still looking around, trying to tell where the voice had come from. “Loads more than I do,” said Ron, shaking his head. “But why’s she got to go to the library?” “Because that’s what Hermione does,” said Ron, shrugging. “When in doubt, go to the library." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Matthew Ward
item.description: "Today is the day we Whipples remind ourselves to squeeze every last ounce of success from every moment of our lives." -- Matthew Ward

item.title: Kristan add a quote by Matthew Ward
item.description: "It's nice to be the best, Son. But it's infinitely better of course, to be the best." -- Matthew Ward

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "Books are the ultimate Dumpees: put them down and they’ll wait for you forever; pay attention to them and they always love you back." -- John Green

item.title: Kristan add a quote by John Green
item.description: "He liked the mere act of reading, the magic of turning scratches on a page into words inside his head." -- John Green
